00395 void GenoCallCoderTest::testDecoding_v0() {
00396   //cout << "testDecoding_v0\n";
00397   GenoCallCoder v0;
00398   for (int i = 0; i < v0_code_vec.size(); i++) {
00399     CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( v0.genotypeCallNumToAbstractAllele( v0_code_vec[i] ) == v0_abs_allele_string_vec[i] );
00400   }
00401 }

00411 void GenoCallCoderTest::testEncoding_v0() {
00412   //cout << "testEncoding_v0\n";
00413   GenoCallCoder v0;
00414   for (int i = 0; i < v0_abs_allele_string_vec.size(); i++) {
00415     CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( v0.abstractAlleleToGenotypeCallNum(v0_abs_allele_string_vec[i]) == v0_code_vec[i] );
00416   }
00417 }

00419 // void GenoCallCoderTest::testEncoding_delimit_v0() {

00459 void GenoCallCoderTest::testAbstractAlelleIntegerEncoding_v1() {
00460   GenoCallCoder v1(6, string("UCHAR"), string("1.0"));
00461   
00462   vector<int> F(1,5); 
00463   //cout << v1.abstractAlleleIntegersToGenotypeCallNum(F) << ":" << static_cast<int>(v1_code_vec[2])  << '\n';
00464   CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( v1.abstractAlleleIntegersToGenotypeCallNum(F) == v1_code_vec[2] );
00465   vector<int> AA(2,0);  
00466   CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( v1.abstractAlleleIntegersToGenotypeCallNum(AA) == v1_code_vec[4] );
00467   vector<int> AB(2,0);
00468   AB[1] = 1;
00469   CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( v1.abstractAlleleIntegersToGenotypeCallNum(AB) == v1_code_vec[5] );
00470   vector<int> BB(2,1);  
00471   CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( v1.abstractAlleleIntegersToGenotypeCallNum(BB) == v1_code_vec[7] );
00472   vector<int> CF(2,2);
00473   CF[1] = 5;
00474   CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( v1.abstractAlleleIntegersToGenotypeCallNum(CF) == v1_code_vec[8] );
00475   vector<int> ABC(3,0);
00476   ABC[1] = 1;
00477   ABC[2] = 2;
00478   CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( v1.abstractAlleleIntegersToGenotypeCallNum(ABC) == v1_code_vec[10] );
00479 }

00628 void GenoCallCoderTest::testGenotypeCallNumToReferenceAllele_delimit_v1() {
00629   GenoCallCoder v1(6, "UCHAR", "1.0", '/', probeset_annot_csv_file);
00630   for (int i = 0; i < reference_geno_calls_test.size(); i++) {
00631     for (int j = 0; j < reference_geno_calls_test[i].size(); j++) {
00632       
00633       CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( v1.genotypeCallNumToReferenceAllele(probeset_ids[i], valid_genotype_call_codes[i][j]) == reference_geno_calls_test[i][j] );
00634       CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( v1.genotypeCallNumToReferenceAllele(probeset_ids[i], 16) == "NoCall" );
00635       CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( v1.genotypeCallNumToReferenceAllele(probeset_ids[i], 254) == "PossibleRareAllele" );
00636       CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( v1.genotypeCallNumToReferenceAllele(probeset_ids[i], 255) == "NotAvailable" );
00637 
00638     }
00639   }
00640 }
